item.title: Tweets
item.description: Interestingly enough people who don’t have touch typing skills use passwords that are suited to type with just one finger. Keep your ears free. No music. No videos. No podcasts.Try it. Will this finally make me insane. A great productivity hack. Pause before you click on anything. Be mindful of what you are reading
